text: Then all the officials of the king of Babylon entered and sat in the Middle Gate: Nergal-sharezer of Samgar, Nebo-sarsekim 39:3 Or Nergal-sharezer, Samgar-nebo, Sarsekim the Rabsaris,39:3 Hebrew Rabsaris is the title of the chief eunuch in the Assyrian military; also in verse 13. Nergal-sharezer the Rabmag,39:3 Hebrew Rabmag is the title of the chief soothsayer or chief of princes in the Assyrian military; also in verse 13. and all the rest of the officials of the king of Babylon.
